name: Wakaly: an infinite 2D runner
description:
CONTROLS

Enter: Start game

Space/Mouse button: Jump

This is just a casual (and my first) project that I wanted to publish here, more projects are being under development.

You can REALLY help me by donating me.

Enjoy playing Wakaly, it's just a game to kill time , no story, no ending, just an alien fetching coins ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
